messages.title: Lend Me Your Vote
messages.content: On 9th June we will wake up to a Conservative Government I will work with that Government to ensure that we get the Brexit we voted for. I will stand for only a single term or as long as it takes for Brexit to truly happen.

messages.title: Havering Council Tax Goes Up Again
messages.content: At the annual council tax setting meeting in February Conservative, Labour and Resident councillors voted to put up Council Tax; UKIP councillors voted against it. The situation is only going to get worse with the recent comments by Theresa May during a recent campaign visit to her constituency, that she intends to maintain Britain’s commitment to spend 0.7 per cent of national income on overseas aid, which would last year have a record £13.3 billion.

messages.title: A More Secure Britain
messages.content: Recruit 20,000 more police officers and 20,000 more soldiers. Rebuild our armed services. Oppose Military intervention in the Middle East.

messages.title: Cut Immigration
messages.content: Introduce a points-based system and restore full border controls.

messages.title: Protect British Culture
messages.content: One legal system for all - no Sharia courts. Defending hard won equality and freedom of speech. Oppose halal and ritual slaughter.

messages.title: NHS Before Foreign Aid
messages.content: Rather than give our money away it will be used to fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs. Scrap hospital parking fees.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Introduce a points-based system and restore full border controls.
Recruit 20,000 more police officers and 20,000 more soldiers. Rebuild our armed services. Oppose Military intervention in the Middle East.
One legal system for all - no Sharia courts. Defending hard won equality and freedom of speech. Oppose halal and ritual slaughter.
Rather than give our money away it will be used to fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs. Scrap hospital parking fees.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Theresa May. Conservative, Labour and Resident councillors.

issues.brexitEurope: A VOTE for UKIP is a VOTE for BREXIT
issues.defence: Recruit 20,000 more police officers and 20,000 more soldiers. Rebuild our armed services. Oppose Military intervention in the Middle East.
issues.environment: Havering Council is keen to maximise the opportunities for growth in the borough and has committed to a series of regeneration projects that will create 30,000 homes.
issues.government: People currently living Havering by building 30,000 homes in the borough over the next 10 years. This will increase the local population by about 33%, yet there are no provisions for new schools or health centers.
issues.health: Scrap hospital parking fees. Rather than give our money away it will be used to fund 20,000 nurses and 10,000 GPs.
issues.immigration: Introduce a points-based system and restore full border controls.
